nodes.text: The E'Y-Akh Desert was located on the planet of Geonosis, close to the main battlefields of the First Battle of Geonosis.

A Republic gunship holding Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Padmé Amidala chased Count Dooku to a hangar on the other side of the desert, where he had hidden his solar sailer. During the chase, Amidala and a clone trooper were knocked off the gunship and into the desert below.
San Hill's Hardcell transport was stranded here without thrusters. Even so, he eventually managed to escape from the Republic.

The Stalgasin hive was located within the boundaries of the desert. Every year, heavy rainfall swept across the desert and overflowed the underground aquifers. This worked out to the Geonosians' advantage, as the subsequent flood killed herds of merdeths which they could then use for food. Merdeth shells littered the desert and polished the sand.
